meanings.definition: The quality of being talkative or gossipy.
meanings.sent1: Her lippiness made her the center of attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy her lippiness; she always has interesting stories to share.
meanings.sent3: His lippiness at the office sometimes leads to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: The lippiness of the town crier spread news faster than any messenger.
meanings.sent5: The lippiness of the parrot entertained the children for hours.

meanings.definition: The state of having prominent or protruding lips.
meanings.sent1: His lippiness gave him a unique look among his friends.
meanings.sent2: She embraced her lippiness and never felt the need for lip fillers.
meanings.sent3: The baby's lippiness made everyone in the family smile.
meanings.sent4: The actress's lippiness added to her charm on screen.
meanings.sent5: The model's lippiness was considered a distinctive feature in the fashion industry.
